meanings.definition: Formed or held based on a mistaken understanding or interpretation.
meanings.sent1: The misconceived idea led to confusion among the students.
meanings.sent2: Her misconceived belief about the weather made her forget her umbrella.
meanings.sent3: The misconceived notion that cats can fly made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His misconceived plan to build a house of cards crumbled quickly.
meanings.sent5: The misconceived theory that plants can talk fascinated the children.

meanings.sent1: The misconceived strategy resulted in a failed mission.
meanings.sent2: Their misconceived decision to take a shortcut only made the journey longer.
meanings.sent3: The misconceived attempt to bake a cake without flour turned into a disaster.
meanings.sent4: His misconceived idea of using a spoon as a hammer didn't end well.
meanings.sent5: The misconceived plan to travel without a map left them lost in the woods.
